name: The Nidus Assault on Sazuki Castle: The Game
name_original: The Nidus Assault on Sazuki Castle: The Game
description:
The Nidus Assault on Sazuki Castle: The Game is a randomly generated visual novel strategy survival game. You must defend Sazuki Castle from the wrath of Nidus and the Insect Clan for 24 hours. Build walls, hire troops, make tactical decisions, survive the onslaught, and protect Sazuki Castle.

This game is part of the Lemniscate lore, you can read up on the Lemniscate lore at the Lemniscate Wiki.
